title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4224.4 - No allowance for beaten horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4224.4 - No allowance for beaten horse

State Regulations

No horse shall receive allowance of weight or be relieved
from extra weight for having been beaten in one or more races; provided that
this section shall not prohibit maiden allowances or allowances to horses that
have not won within a specified time or that have not won races of specified
value. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4224.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
